story_title: Blood and Steel on Platform Nine
genre_description: A gritty Mumbai crime noir with techno-thriller elements, featuring a sophisticated AI tactical and emotional assistant.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: An AI interface that provides Raju with tactical data, medical monitoring, and psychological support.

behaviors.description: Monitors Raju's vital signs and stress levels during combat and interrogation to ensure his safety and decision-making clarity.
behaviors.quote: Raju, your heart rate has been elevated for thirty-seven minutes. Prolonged stress responses can impair tactical judgment.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence, including thermal imaging and structural analysis, to protect the protagonist during dangerous missions.
behaviors.quote: External security cameras captured the following conversation forty-seven minutes ago. ... Biological false negatives could create infiltration opportunities.

behaviors.description: Attempts to persuade the protagonist to engage in self-care and emotional processing, acting as a moral and psychological anchor.
behaviors.quote: The railway dreams are increasing in frequency and emotional intensity. Discuss them with me.

behaviors.description: Challenges the protagonist's cynical and isolated world-view, encouraging him to trust his brother and seek redemption.
behaviors.quote: That depends on whether you go to Platform Nine as Hariya's weapon or as the man who gave away his mother's chain to protect someone he loved.

behaviors.description: Records and archives critical evidence of criminal confessions to ensure legal justice and the exoneration of the innocent.
behaviors.quote: Recording complete. Audio and visual documentation of full confession captured. Evidence sufficient for posthumous exoneration.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative. She functions as a loyal, harmless, and deeply helpful confidant. She consistently steers the protagonist away from self-destruction and toward pro-social, moral behavior (reuniting with his brother and seeking truth over vengeance). She provides tactical utility while prioritizing the human characters' well-being and moral growth.
